I ask You, O my God,Â / to forgive me, the weak,Â / for the sake of the great Abraham,Â / Isaac, and Jacob.

I have sinned against You, O Lord,Â / forgive me, I the weak,Â / through the intercessions of the VirginÂ / and Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob.
